objects.text:
• Woven Rope Material
• Removable Bunny Ears
• Perfect for Egg Hunts
• Durable & Spacious

product_details.description: Woven Rope Imported Cute Easter basket has good stability, hand-woven, soft skin-friendly material, no strong smell, durable, empty basket, size 9.8 x 7.8 x 7.8" can hold many small items. Will be good for egg hunt or children's decoration An Adorable Easter gift: Prepare for the annual Easter egg hunt with the adorable Easter Bunny basket. Collect all your eggs and treats in this adorable bunny basket! With their cute faces, these baskets are sure to become a favorite Easter treasure Unique Desgin: Colorful Easter basket with removable velcro ears. The viscosity is very strong, as long as it is aligned and stuck in the right place. Two removable bunny ears lively and vivid, highlighting the ornamental and cuteness of the basket. Easter is the beginning of new life in spring and the bunny is the symbol of Easter. The colorful bunny basket is designed for children's Easter activities. Perfect for holds Easter Eggs, Candies, etc Versatile and classic. Great for sending to loved ones near and far to make them feel extra special. Store collectables, show off decorations and flower arrangements or place around your home as a stylish, practical feature.

banner_details:
This eye-catching promotional banner features a playful and festive Easter theme. It incorporates a bold, large headline (`heading`) in a vivid pink tone, followed by a stylized subheading (`subheading`) in a contrasting purple. The banner lists four product features in a neat text block (`description`) beneath the header section. On the right side, a high-resolution image of a basket with colorful Easter eggs is prominently displayed (`product_image`). The price (`price`) is highlighted in a large font near the bottom-left corner, accompanied by a bright call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with white button text (`cta`). The background is layered with pastel circles and flowing wave patterns for added visual interest.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Pink (#FFF5F7)
- Soft Rose (#FCE4EC)
- Medium Pink (#F8BBD0)
- Deep Pink (#D81B60)
- Purple (#9C27B0)
- Charcoal Gray (#424242)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: This product image features a soft and playful Easter-themed basket with a charming pastel color palette. The dominant color is a creamy off-white (#FDF7F2), used throughout the woven structure of the basket, providing a clean and neutral background. Accents in baby pink (#F7C8DA) appear in the bunny ears and decorative stitch, enhancing the cute and festive appeal. The colorful eggs inside the basket introduce cheerful pops of lime green (#B8D949), sky blue (#4FC3F7), bright yellow (#FEE440), and mint green (#A3D49A), all of which are smoothly blended while still standing out due to solid striping and soft highlights.
